en.title: Achievers Recognition Dinner, PGRM, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia 28th February 2009 (1)
en.content:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at Menara PGRM, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia on the 28th February 2009 was a GREAT SUCCESS with a full house crowd of 1600 Members, Leaders, VIPs and Invited Guests (FE apologizes to those members who could not get tables due to limited space). There were many FE leaders attending from overseas including 200 from Thailand, 15 from Philippines, from Singapore, Australia, Indonesia, Pakistan, India, Laos, Hong Kong, UK, Taiwan, Guam, Hawaai, etc. It was great to see so many committed leaders from all over the world gathering at the event.

HIGHLIGHTS OF EVENT:

- Entertainment by popular jazz band. Amazing performance on the flute by "Father of Thai Jazz"
  Thewan Yakorn.

- Martial Arts "Zero Crime Campaign" Demonstration by Chek Quen Do Club and Mockup Cheque
  presentation of RM 6,000 sponsorship by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting to Andrew Leong, President
  Chek Quen Do Club.

- Opening Speech by FE Founder Director KS Lee.

- Quantum Pendant Demos by Presidential Director KC Phoon which never fails to impress the crowd.
  Well done, KC!

- Mockup Cheque presentation of RM 6,000 sponsorship by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting to Chong
  Tuck Meng (Founder of Perwira K9) representing the Pahang Wheelchair Basketball Association.

- Presentation on School of Networking (Chinese) by trainers Jacky Cheng and Lenny Painin.

- Speech by Annie Varghese from Women's Aid Organization (WAO) and Mockup cheque
  presentation of RM 20,000 donation from FE. WAO provides home and shelter where victims of
  domestic violence and their children can seek refuge. WAO was started in 1979 by the late Tun Tan
  Siew Sin. FE is proud to be able to contribute towards the shelter and help the victims of domestic
  violence.

- Speech by Presidential Director Pastor Arthur Medina from Philippines who as usual spoke strongly
  and with passion on his wonderful experience with FE building power networks WORLDWIDE.
  Pastor Art's network is expanding rapidly and globally to Africa, Europe, Middle East, India, USA,
  Hawaii, etc. Congratulations, Art! See you at the top!

- Song Performance by FE Leader, Jimmy Dee from Guam. Jimmy performed in many countries
  including on Broadway, Las Vegas. Great to have you with us!

- Song Performance by FE Leaders from Philippines, Effren Fortuna and Dr Becky Singson. Wow! You
  guys can sing!

- Speech by Thai Presidential Director Jankij who impressed the crowd with his success story. Jankij
  has 24 Presidential Directors in his network! Congratulations! You made it!

- Speech by Thai Country Licensee, Don Chan. Don shared his success in Thailand with the crowd.
  Congratulations, Don!

- Installation of new Presidential Directors, Executive Directors and Directors on the stage.

- Special "Perfect Score" Award Presentation to PD Jankij and wife from Thailand! Congratulations!

- New PDs sharing their success with the crowd. It was highly motivating to hear from PD Chewan
  from Thailand who one year ago was working at odd jobs, including washing dishes to support her
  family. She had no money to even buy milk for her children! Today she drives a brand new Toyota
  Camry and lives in a new house and is earning Baht 1 million (USD 28,000) a month! A truly
  amazing achievement! If PD Chewan and the other PDs with similar stories can do it, so can YOU!!

- Motivation Sharing by Presidential Director and global jet setter Rachel Thomas. Rachel has been
  flying from country to country lately building her group. She just came back from Australia,
  New Zealand, Indonesia and next week she's off to Nigeria and Ghana! Rachel, you make us proud!

- Closing Speech by Presidential Director, KC Phoon. Just like Rachel, FE's jet setting KC just came
  back from Indonesia and Thailand and is off again to Vietnam for the coming event there on the
  7th March. FE is truly expanding by leaps and bounds!

A BIG THANK YOU to MC Lovey Lee for a great job done!
 
< Click here for more photos >

meta.description:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at Menara PGRM, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia on the 28th February 2009 was a GREAT SUCCESS with a full house crowd of 1600 Members, Leaders, VIPs and invited guests (FE apologises to those members who could not get tables due to limited space). There were many FE leaders attending from overseas including 200 from Thailand, 15 from Philippines, from Singapore, Australia, Indonesia, Pakistan, India, Laos, Hong Kong, UK, Taiwan, Guam, Hawaai, etc. It was great to see so many committed leaders from all over the world gathering at the event.
HIGHLIGHTS OF EVENT:
- Entertainment by popular jazz band. Amazing performance on the flute by "Father of Thai Jazz" Thewan Yakorn.
- Martial Arts "Zero Crime Campaign" Demonstration by Chek Quen Do Club and Mockup Cheque presentation of RM 6,000 sponsorship by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting to Andrew Leong, President Chek Quen Do Club.
- Opening Speech by FE Founder Director KS Lee.
- Quantum Pendant Demos by Presidential Director KC Phoon which never fails to impress the crowd. Well done, KC!
- Mockup Cheque presentation of RM 6,000 sponsorship by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting to Chong Tuck Meng (Founder of Perwira K9) representing the Pahang Wheelchair Basketball Association.
- Presentation on School of Networking (Chinese) by trainers Jacky Cheng and Lenny Painin.
- Speech by Annie Varghese from Women's Aid Organisation (WAO) and Mockup cheque presentation of RM 20,000 donation from FE. WAO provides home and shelter where victims of domestic violence and their children can seek refuge. WAO was started in 1979 by the late Tun Tan Siew Sin. FE is proud to be able to contribute towards the shelter and help the victims of domestic violence.
- Speech by Presidential Director Pastor Arthur Medina from Philippines who as usual spoke strongly and with passion on his wonderful experience with FE building power networks WORLDWIDE. Pastor Art's network is expanding rapidly and globally to Africa, Europe, Middle East, India, USA, Hawaii, etc. Congratulations, Art! See you at the top!
- Song Performance by FE Leader, Jimmy Dee from Guam. Jimmy performed in many countries including on Broadway, Las Vegas. Great to have you with us!
- Song Performance by FE Leaders from Philippines, Effren Fortuna and Dr Becky Singson. Wow! You guys can sing!
- Speech by Thai Presidential Director Jankij who impressed the crowd with his success story. Jankij has 24 Presidential Directors in his network! Congratulations! You made it!
- Speech by Thai Country Licensee, Don Chan. Don shared his success in Thailand with the crowd. Congratulations, Don!
- Installation of new Presidential Directors, Executive Directors and Directors on the stage.
- Special "Perfect Score" Award Presentation to PD Jankij and wife from Thailand! Congratulations!
- New PDs sharing their success with the crowd. It was highly motivating to hear from PD Chewan from Thailand who one year ago was working at odd jobs, including washing dishes to support her family. She had no money to even buy milk for her children! Today she drives a brand new Toyota Camry and lives in a new house and is earning Baht 1 million (USD 28,000) a month! A truly amazing achievement! If PD Chewan and the other PDs with similar stories can do it, so can YOU!!
- Motivation Sharing by Presidential Director and global jet setter Rachel Thomas. Rachel has been flying from country to country lately building her group. She just came back from Australia, New Zealand, Indonesia and next week she's off to Nigeria and Ghana! Rachel, you make us proud!
- Closing Speech by Presidential Director, KC Phoon. Just like Rachel, FE's jet setting KC just came back from Indonesia and Thailand and is off again to Vietnam for the coming event there on the 7th March. FE is truly expanding by leaps and bounds!
A BIG THANK YOU to MC Lovey Lee for a great job done!
meta.keyword: Achievers Recognition Dinner, PGRM, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia 28th February 2009 (1)
meta.author: klhunter

meta.description:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at Menara PGRM, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia on the 28th February 2009 was a GREAT SUCCESS with a full house crowd of 1600 Members, Leaders, VIPs and invited guests (FE apologises to those members who could not get tables due to limited space). There were many FE leaders attending from overseas including 200 from Thailand, 15 from Philippines, from Singapore, Australia, Indonesia, Pakistan, India, Laos, Hong Kong, UK, Taiwan, Guam, Hawaai, etc. It was great to see so many committed leaders from all over the world gathering at the event.
HIGHLIGHTS OF EVENT:
- Entertainment by popular jazz band. Amazing performance on the flute by "Father of Thai Jazz" Thewan Yakorn.
- Martial Arts "Zero Crime Campaign" Demonstration by Chek Quen Do Club and Mockup Cheque presentation of RM 6,000 sponsorship by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting to Andrew Leong, President Chek Quen Do Club.
- Opening Speech by FE Founder Director KS Lee.
- Quantum Pendant Demos by Presidential Director KC Phoon which never fails to impress the crowd. Well done, KC!
- Mockup Cheque presentation of RM 6,000 sponsorship by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting to Chong Tuck Meng (Founder of Perwira K9) representing the Pahang Wheelchair Basketball Association.
- Presentation on School of Networking (Chinese) by trainers Jacky Cheng and Lenny Painin.
- Speech by Annie Varghese from Women's Aid Organisation (WAO) and Mockup cheque presentation of RM 20,000 donation from FE. WAO provides home and shelter where victims of domestic violence and their children can seek refuge. WAO was started in 1979 by the late Tun Tan Siew Sin. FE is proud to be able to contribute towards the shelter and help the victims of domestic violence.
- Speech by Presidential Director Pastor Arthur Medina from Philippines who as usual spoke strongly and with passion on his wonderful experience with FE building power networks WORLDWIDE. Pastor Art's network is expanding rapidly and globally to Africa, Europe, Middle East, India, USA, Hawaii, etc. Congratulations, Art! See you at the top!
- Song Performance by FE Leader, Jimmy Dee from Guam. Jimmy performed in many countries including on Broadway, Las Vegas. Great to have you with us!
- Song Performance by FE Leaders from Philippines, Effren Fortuna and Dr Becky Singson. Wow! You guys can sing!
- Speech by Thai Presidential Director Jankij who impressed the crowd with his success story. Jankij has 24 Presidential Directors in his network! Congratulations! You made it!
- Speech by Thai Country Licensee, Don Chan. Don shared his success in Thailand with the crowd. Congratulations, Don!
- Installation of new Presidential Directors, Executive Directors and Directors on the stage.
- Special "Perfect Score" Award Presentation to PD Jankij and wife from Thailand! Congratulations!
- New PDs sharing their success with the crowd. It was highly motivating to hear from PD Chewan from Thailand who one year ago was working at odd jobs, including washing dishes to support her family. She had no money to even buy milk for her children! Today she drives a brand new Toyota Camry and lives in a new house and is earning Baht 1 million (USD 28,000) a month! A truly amazing achievement! If PD Chewan and the other PDs with similar stories can do it, so can YOU!!
- Motivation Sharing by Presidential Director and global jet setter Rachel Thomas. Rachel has been flying from country to country lately building her group. She just came back from Australia, New Zealand, Indonesia and next week she's off to Nigeria and Ghana! Rachel, you make us proud!
- Closing Speech by Presidential Director, KC Phoon. Just like Rachel, FE's jet setting KC just came back from Indonesia and Thailand and is off again to Vietnam for the coming event there on the 7th March. FE is truly expanding by leaps and bounds!
A BIG THANK YOU to MC Lovey Lee for a great job done!
